mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_exp (resume_id, company, department, start_date, end_date, is_current, position, salary, description) VALUES (#{resumeId}, #{company}, #{department}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{isCurrent}, #{position}, #{salary}, #{description});
mapper.update: UPDATE work_exp SET company = #{company}, department = #{department}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, is_current = #{isCurrent}, position = #{position}, salary = #{salary}, description = #{description}, exp_file_name = #{expFileName}, exp_file_path = #{expFilePath} WHERE exp_id = #{expId};
